service_definition_overrides.Configurations/SVCConfiguration/Definiti: Example of a layover-shadow map optionally available for inclusion in an RTC product package processed by ASF.

Example of a layover-shadow map optionally available for inclusion in an RTC product package processed by ASF. This file indicates which pixels in the RTC image have been affected by layover and shadow.
RTC products processed by ASF DAAC HyP3 2023 using GAMMA software. Contains modified Copernicus Sentinel data 2022, processed by ESA.
